MDPHierarchy

Class MDP

  • java.lang.Object
    • MDPHierarchy.MDP
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggMDP, GridMDP

    public abstract class MDP
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to be used as an interface for writing Markov Decision Models
    Author:
    gcoman

       int a,
       MDP.State cn)
                  throws MDP.InvalidMDPException
        returns the probability of transitioning from s to sn when taking action a
        Parameters:
        c - : start state
        a - : action taken
        cn - : next state
        Returns:
        probability of transition, as a double

        public abstract java.util.Map<MDP.State,java.lang.Double> getHistogram(MDP.State s,
                                                     int a)
                                                                throws MDP.InvalidMDPException
        Returns a histogram representing the transition from an input state under a given input action.
        Parameters:
        s - : start state
        a - : action taken
        Returns:
        an integer based histogram representing the transition map under the input s-a pair
        Throws:
        MDP.InvalidMDPException
